column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////When we sat down
column2: my friends and I picked several pastries
column3: and we shared them at our table. The pastries were big
column5: and flaky. It was my first time having a kugelhopf. It was doughnut-like
column7: and tasted similar to a danish at the same time. I had orange juice to wash down my breakfast
column8: but I wished it came in a bigger glass is all. The customer service was great. They gave customers linen napkins
